name: Papi Commando Remix - Megadrive
description:
!! Papi Commando Remix !!

Here is a new extra version with enhanced graphics and some news improvement and bugs fixes.

The game is exactly the same than the original Free Game( https://vetea.itch.io/papi-commando-megadrive-version- )

Retreive Papi, Mami and the terrible C++ Forces for a fantastic Retro Battle with the final fight with Colonel KassTaGoul !

PAPI MOVE : * D-PAD 1 TO MOVE. * START TO PAUSE THE GAME. * BUTTON A TO FIRE. * BUTTON B TO REZ PLAYER AND CIVILIANS * BUTTON C TO USE KNIFE.

 MAMI MOVE : * D-PAD 2 TO MOVE. * START TO START THE 2P MODE. * BUTTON A TO FIRE. * BUTTON B TO REZ PLAYER AND CIVILIANS.

If you enjoy the game, don't forget to rate it or write a comment, thanks ! ;-)

Have Fun !!

Vetea
